array.string: prepend and append paths to @INC, using /Library/Perl/%lt;version%gt;/PrependToPath and /Library/Perl/%lt;version%gt;/AppendToPath
Config returns the correct sizes for both 32 and 64-bit
make CPAN::HandleConfig more forgiving about directory permissions

added new /Library/Perl/Updates/%lt;version%gt; directory that comes before the system perl directories in the module search order; installprivlib and installarchlib now point to this Updates directory
